p.k: Comedy, Short Canada (1965). Hrají: Buster Keaton. Režie: Gerald Potterton, Buster Keaton.
p.d: After reading an newspaper advertisement in the London Times about touring Canada, an elderly Englishman decides to do just that. Following his long walk across the Atlantic Ocean, Keaton travels along the Canadian National Railway tracks on a railway motorcar (speeder), performing a few stunts reminiscent of those in his younger days.
